actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 1426 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1426 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S8732-8734; text: CR S8732-8733) To express the sense of the Senate on the declassification and release to the public of certain portions of the Report of the Joint Inquiry into the Terrorist Attacks of September 11, 2001, and to urge the President to release information regarding sources of foreign support for the hijackers involved in the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1426 proposed by Senator Dorgan.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate on the declassification and release to the public of certain portions of the Report of the Joint Inquiry into the Terrorist Attacks of September 11, 2001, and to urge the President to release information regarding sources of foreign support for the hijackers involved in the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.
